title: looking for adc main for serious ranked team.
body:
must have teamspeak and be able to play regurlaly
add me on league at Thebroken1 :D

replies.body:
Ok sounds good, I main teemo adc and bard adc, im bronze 5 but im getting a lot better i dont have teamspeak because my mum doesnt like me talking to strangers :) im young but mature for my age :):)


{{summoner:17}}  {{champion:17}}
ill tell your mum to let you talk next time i see her ;)

Hey BROKEN1, mature payer ADC is all i play - im good but not great,  play nearly everyday, most important though is that i have the right attitude and can take critisism well - really want to evolve with like minded players and move away from the idiot ragers and selfish non objective focused players.

i have added you hope you accept, love to play with you and your future team.

Merladdin

Hi,

Just added you, don't have TS but can download easily enough.
Bronze 3 ADC last season 
Main Jinx & Ashe, can play MF, Vayne & Trist
Have the ability to play silver, just stuck in bad ELO.

SteaksauceX
ADC Main currently silver 2, been in gold 3 would like to join :)
I main ADC but it depends on what elo your going for cause im only bronze but i would sure be keen to join c:

ADC main
